title: Milko33
author: Milko33
content: Hello,Do you know Stakos?Decentralized Cloud Web3 Project, Yield Node NFT. A pioneer in the cloud environmentThe team participates in all cryptographic events, forges several partnerships, The team has an important presence in India.The number of projects that deploy on Stackos is constantly increasingPolygon, Saito, Reef, Avalanche have migrated to this web3 solutionThe team is building a lot in this bear market.This #Alt has great potentialCurrently only available on Metamask-Website:https://www.stackos.io/-Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeployOnStackOS/status/1604005075055411200?t=m7CD0swngmFGWzUz6COgpw&s=19-Telegram: https://t.me/stacktrade-CoinMarketCap: https://www.coingecko.com/fr/pi%C3%A8ces/stackos

comments.author: Milko33
comments.body: Okx exchange has a problem with its cloud service #AlibabaWe know that OKX spoke with the Deployonstackos team during the Crypto Token2049 event in London a few weeks ago.The Stackos future has materialized, I invite you to DYORI would also like to have your opinion. For the moment no marketing and listing has been done.Coinbase also mentioned Stackos in September 2022https://twitter.com/okx/status/1604395904219242497?t=V0dGfefecn4ADsxqNd4TMQ&s=19
